mapper.insert: INSERT INTO charger ( charger_no, connector, image, ev_current, ev_voltage, ev_power, ev_level, ev_support ) VALUES ( #{charger_no}, #{connector}, #{image}, #{ev_current}, #{ev_voltage}, #{ev_power}, #{ev_level}, #{ev_support} )
mapper.update: UPDATE charger SET connector = #{}, image = #{}, ev_current = #{}, ev_voltage = #{}, ev_power = #{}, ev_level = #{}, ev_support = #{} WHERE charger_no = #{}
mapper.select: SELECT charger_no, connector, image, ev_current, ev_voltage, ev_power, ev_level, ev_support FROM charger WHERE charger_no = #{charger_no}
